description: Create a RBAC policy for a given tenant.
name: rbac-create

action.description: Action for the RBAC policy. (choices: access_as_external, access_as_shared)

format.description: the output format, defaults to table (choices: json, shell, table, value, yaml)

name.description: ID or name of the RBAC object.

noindent.description: whether to disable indenting the JSON

project_id.description: Run the action under a different project, identified by id

project_name.description: Run the action under a different project, identified by name

target_tenant.description: ID of the tenant to which the RBAC policy will be enforced.

type.description: Type of the object that RBAC policy affects. (choices: qos-policy, network)
